title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 75/97 of 17 January 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 1487/95 establishing the supply balance for the Canary Islands for products from the pigmeat sector and fixing the aid for products coming from the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 75/97 of 17 January 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 1487/95 establishing the supply balance for the Canary Islands for products from the pigmeat sector and fixing the aid for products coming from the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I and II to Regulation (EC) No 1487/95 are replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 January 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 320, 11. 12. 1996, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 145, 29. 6. 1995, p. 63.
(4) OJ No L 153, 27. 6. 1996, p. 17.
